title: DAOKit Heartbeat Status Contract
description: Canonical liveness and escalation status for active orchestrator execution.

schema_version.description: Contract version for backward-safe heartbeat parsing.

last_heartbeat_at.description: Most recent heartbeat timestamp, null before first signal.

reason_code.description: Optional reason code for warning/stale states.

warning_after_seconds.description: Silence threshold in seconds that moves status into WARNING.

stale_after_seconds.description: Silence threshold in seconds that moves status into STALE.

updated_at.description: UTC timestamp of the last heartbeat state update.

last_escalation_at.description: Timestamp of the latest deduplicated escalation event.
